title: Best Gaming Mouse
description: We own this ourselves, and it performs just as well as the Logitech PRO X SUPERLIGHT 2—without the extra $120 price tag. Super accurate for flicking chess moves!

title: Wooden Chess Board
description: This 3-in-1 wooden chess set is compact and easy to take anywhere. Honestly it’s great quality for the price. If you don't yet have a chess board, this is a great choice for your first one.
